text: Na ɲɛ igbilenyi, kike firin nde, Salatiyeli xa di Sorobabeli, Yosadaki xa di Yesuwa, e ngaxakerenyie, sɛrɛxɛdubɛe, Lewi bɔnsɔɛ mixie, nun ɲama naxan keli konyiya kui Perise bɔxi ma, e birin naxa wali fɔlɔ. Alatala xa banxi wali naxa taxu Lewi bɔnsɔɛ mixie ra, naxee nu bara ɲɛ mɔxɔɲɛn nun a xanbi sɔtɔ.
